Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  5 YEAR, 15 MILL PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR GIVING SUPPORT TO PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS IN UNION PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District No. 1 of the Parish of Union, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of fifteen (15) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $1,268,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2012, for the purpose of giving support to public elementary and secondary schools in Union Parish?

Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  8 YEAR, 1.64 MILL PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR BUILDING, REPAIRING AND EQUIPPING SCHOOLS IN UNION PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District No. 1 of the Parish of Union, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of one and sixty-four hundredths (1.64) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $145,300 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) for a period of eight (8) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of building, repairing and equipping schools within said District?

Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3
(RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  7 YEAR, 2.98 MILL PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR OPERATING AND MAINTAINING SCHOOLS IN UNION PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District No. 1 of the Parish of Union, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of two and ninety-eight hundredths (2.98) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $252,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) for a period of seven (7) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of operating and maintaining schools within said District?
